expression: zip(split(patientIds,','), '.', substring(split(conditions,';'), 1, 3), '.', substring(admissionDate, 6, 7), '.', (((age * ageRisk + bmi * bmiRisk + bloodPressure * bpRisk + cholesterol * cholRisk) / totalRisk) > criticalThreshold ? (equals(substring(split(medications,','), 1, 4), 'Anti') & insuranceTier > '2' & familyHistory = 'positive' ? '.high_priority_covered' : '.high_priority_review') : (((age * ageRisk + bmi * bmiRisk + bloodPressure * bpRisk + cholesterol * cholRisk) / totalRisk) > moderateThreshold ? '.moderate_monitoring' : '.routine_care')))
